remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范和[开放打包约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范构成的有效 URI。`partUri` must be valid URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 如果部件的 不是直接已知的，并且在调用 时将设置，则使用此构造函数。Use this constructor when the of the part is not immediately known and will be set later when is called. 默认情况下，部件的 属性将初始化为 。By default, the property of the part is initialized to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范和[开放打包约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范构成的有效 URI。`partUri` must be valid URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. 默认情况下，部件的 属性将初始化为 。By default, the property of the part is initialized to . `contentType` 必须是根据[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议-HTTP*、节3.7 生成的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 类型。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表显示了 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档中使用的内容 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 类型的示例。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|内容类型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字体Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 配置文件ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 图像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊字体Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 图像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 图像TIFF image|image/tiffimage/tiff| |Windows Media 照片图像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

span.span: or is .
is not a valid URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `partUri` 必须是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范和[开放打包约定](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)规范构成的有效 URI。`partUri` must be valid URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification and the [Open Packaging Conventions](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255) specification. `contentType` 必须是根据[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议-HTTP*、节3.7 生成的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 类型。`contentType` must be a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表显示了 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档中使用的内容 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 类型的示例。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|内容类型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字体Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 配置文件ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 图像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊字体Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 图像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 图像TIFF image|image/tiffimage/tiff| |Windows Media 照片图像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

is not a valid URI.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是只读属性，只有当父 处于打开状态时才能访问该属性。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 属性由 构造函数自动设置。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 在构造函数设置后，不能更改 。After it is set by the constructor, the cannot be changed. 属性是根据[RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *超文本传输协议-HTTP*（第3.7 节）形成的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 类型。The property is a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type formed in accordance with the [RFC 2616](https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616.html) *Hypertext Transfer Protocol - HTTP*, Section 3.7. 下表显示了 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 文档中使用的内容 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 类型的示例。The following table shows an example of the content [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] types used in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documents. |描述Description|内容类型Content Type| |-----------------|------------------| |字体Font|application/vnd.ms-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-opentype| |ICC 配置文件ICC profile|application/vnd.ms-color.iccprofileapplication/vnd.ms-color.iccprofile| |JPEG 图像JPEG image|image/jpegimage/jpeg| |模糊字体Obfuscated font|application/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentypeapplication/vnd.ms-package.obfuscated-opentype| |PNG 图像PNG image|image/pngimage/png| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|application/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xmlapplication/vnd.ms-printing.printticket+xml| |TIFF 图像TIFF image|image/tiffimage/tiff| |Windows Media 照片图像Windows Media Photo image|image/vnd.ms-photoimage/vnd.ms-photo|

Open Packaging Conventions Specification

summary.span: 创建此 与指定目标 或外部资源之间的部分级关系。

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分级关系定义此部件与目标部件或资源之间的关联。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 部分级别关系可以是以下两种形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 在源 到 内部的目标 。Between a source to a target inside the . - 在源 与包外部的目标资源之间。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部分关系中，源部分被视为关系的 "所有者"。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源部件时，还将删除该部件拥有的所有关系。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以任何方式在物理上改变目标部分或资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不会以任何方式物理更改源部分或目标部分或资源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 关系的目标不能是另一个关系。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 有关包关系的详细信息，请参阅 上可供下载的*开放打包约定（OPC）* 规范的1.3 节。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at . 有关 XPS 文档的详细信息，请参阅可在 下载的*开放 XML 纸张规范（XPS）* 。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at .

span.span: Open Packaging Conventions Specification

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship (Uri targetUri, System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship(class System.Uri targetUri, valuetype System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType) cil managed
Public Function CreateRelationship (targetUri As Uri, targetMode As TargetMode, relationshipType As String) As PackageRelationship
public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationship ^ CreateRelationship(Uri ^ targetUri, System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode targetMode, System::String ^ relationshipType);
member this.CreateRelationship : Uri * System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode * string -> System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: targetUri
param.span: 目标部件的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the target part.

param.name: targetMode
param.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

param.span: 例如，如果目标部分在 的内部，则为 ；如果目标是 外部的资源，则为 。

span.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

param.name: relationshipType
param.span: 关系的角色。

span.span: The role of the relationship.

summary.span: 创建此 与指定目标 或外部资源之间的部分级关系。

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

returns.span: 此 与目标 或外部资源之间的部分级关系。

span.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分级关系定义此部件与目标部件或资源之间的关联。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 部分级别关系可以是以下两种形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 在源 到 内部的目标 。Between a source to a target inside the . - 在源 与包外部的目标资源之间。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部分关系中，源部分被视为关系的 "所有者"。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源部件时，还将删除该部件拥有的所有关系。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以任何方式在物理上改变目标部分或资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. 方法不会以任何方式物理更改源部分或目标部分或资源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 关系的目标不能是另一个关系。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果 `targetMode` 指定为 ，则 `targetUri` 必须是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范而形成的相对 URI。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 内部相对 URI 可以是以正斜杠（"/"）字符开头的绝对路径，例如 "/page1.xaml" 或 "/images/picture4.jpg"，也可以是相对路径（如 "..."）。/imagespicture1.jpg "，它解析为包根（"/"）作为基 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果 `targetMode` 指定为 ，则 `targetUri` 可以是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范形成的绝对或相对 URI。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. `"https://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml"` 是引用外部目标资源 "page2" 的绝对 URI 的示例。`"https://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml"` is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". "images/picture1" 是相对 URI 的一个示例，它也引用外部目标资源 "1 .jpg"，但会根据包本身的 URI 进行解析。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必须是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范进行格式的 URI。`relationshipType` must be a URI that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的包类型可以定义不同的部分级别关系类型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表显示了为符合*OPEN XML 纸张规范（XPS）* 的文档定义的部件级 `relationshipType` uri。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文档部件级关系XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|关系类型 URIRelationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |数字签名定义Digital Signature Definitions|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions`| |DiscardControlDiscardControl|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/discard-control`| |DocumentStructureDocumentStructure|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/documentstructure`| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/printticket`| |所需资源Required Resource|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource`| |限制字体Restricted Font|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/restricted-font`| |StartPartStartPart|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/fixedrepresentation`| |StoryFragmentsStoryFragments|`http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/storyfragments`| 有关包关系的详细信息，请参阅 上可供下载的*开放打包约定（OPC）* 规范的1.3 节。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at . 有关 XPS 文档的详细信息，请参阅可在[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)下载的*开放 XML 纸张规范（XPS）* 。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

Open Packaging Conventions Specification

MemberSignature.Value: public System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship (Uri targetUri, System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id);

.method public hidebysig instance class System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship CreateRelationship(class System.Uri targetUri, valuetype System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode targetMode, string relationshipType, string id) cil managed
Public Function CreateRelationship (targetUri As Uri, targetMode As TargetMode, relationshipType As String, id As String) As PackageRelationship
public: System::IO::Packaging::PackageRelationship ^ CreateRelationship(Uri ^ targetUri, System::IO::Packaging::TargetMode targetMode, System::String ^ relationshipType, System::String ^ id);
member this.CreateRelationship : Uri * System.IO.Packaging.TargetMode * string * string -> System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship

param.name: targetUri
param.span: 目标部件的 URI。

span.span: The URI of the target part.

param.name: targetMode
param.span: 枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values.

param.span: 例如，如果目标部分在 的内部，则为 ；如果目标是 外部的资源，则为 。

span.span: For example, if the target part is inside the ; or if the target is a resource outside the .

param.name: relationshipType
param.span: 关系的角色。

span.span: The role of the relationship.

param.name: id
param.span: 关系的唯一 ID。

span.span: A unique ID for the relationship.

summary.span: 创建此 与指定目标 或外部资源之间的部分级关系。

span.span: Creates a part-level relationship between this to a specified target or external resource.

returns.span: 此 与目标 或外部资源之间的部分级关系。

span.span: The part-level relationship between this to the target or external resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分级关系定义此部件与目标部件或资源之间的关联。A part-level relationship defines an association between this part and a target part or resource. 部分级别关系可以是以下两种形式之一。A part-level relationship can be one of two forms. - 在源 到 内部的目标 。Between a source to a target inside the . - 在源 与包外部的目标资源之间。Between a source to a target resource outside the package. 在部分关系中，源部分被视为关系的 "所有者"。In a part-relationship the source part is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源部件时，还将删除该部件拥有的所有关系。When the source part is deleted, all the relationships owned by the part are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以任何方式在物理上改变目标部分或资源。The process of creating or deleting the relationship does not physically alter the target part or resource in any way. `id` 必须是有效的 XML 标识符。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id` 类型为 xsd： ID，必须遵循*XML 架构第2部分：数据类型*规范（请参阅[https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)）中规定的命名约定。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 方法不会以任何方式物理更改源部分或目标部分或资源。The method does not physically change either the source part, or the target part or resource in any way. 关系的目标不能是另一个关系。The target of a relationship cannot be another relationship. 如果 `targetMode` 指定为 ，则 `targetUri` 必须是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范而形成的相对 URI。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` must be a relative URI that is formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 内部相对 URI 可以是以正斜杠（"/"）字符开头的绝对路径，例如 "/page1.xaml" 或 "/images/picture4.jpg"，也可以是相对路径（如 "..."）。/imagespicture1.jpg "，它解析为包根（"/"）作为基 URI。The internal relative URI can be either an absolute path that starts with a forward slash ("/") character such as "/page1.xaml" or "/images/picture4.jpg", or a relative path such as "../imagespicture1.jpg" that resolves against the package root ("/") as the base URI. 如果 `targetMode` 指定为 ，则 `targetUri` 可以是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范形成的绝对或相对 URI。If `targetMode` is specified as , `targetUri` can be either an absolute or relative URI formed in accordance with the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. "https://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" 是引用外部目标资源 "page2" 的绝对 URI 的示例。"https://www.microsoft.com/page2.xml" is an example of an absolute URI that references an external target resource "page2.xml". "images/picture1" 是相对 URI 的一个示例，它也引用外部目标资源 "1 .jpg"，但会根据包本身的 URI 进行解析。"images/picture1.jpg" is an example of a relative URI that also references an external target resource "1.jpg" but which resolves against the URI of the package itself. `relationshipType` 必须是根据[RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *统一资源标识符（URI）通用语法*规范进行格式的 URI。`relationshipType` must be a URI that is formed according to the [RFC 3986](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3986) *Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) Generic Syntax* specification. 不同的包类型可以定义不同的部分级别关系类型。Different package types can define different part-level relationship types. 下表显示了为符合*OPEN XML 纸张规范（XPS）* 的文档定义的部件级 `relationshipType` uri。The following table shows the part-level `relationshipType` URIs defined for documents that conform to the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)*. |XPS 文档部件级关系XPS Document Part-Level Relationship|关系类型 URIRelationship Type URI| |-------------------------------------------|---------------------------| |数字签名定义Digital Signature Definitions|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/signature-definitions| |DiscardControlDiscardControl|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/discard-control| |DocumentStructureDocumentStructure|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/documentstructure| |PrintTicketPrintTicket|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/printticket| |所需资源Required Resource|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/required-resource| |限制字体Restricted Font|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/restricted-font| |StartPartStartPart|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/fixedrepresentation| |StoryFragmentsStoryFragments|http://schemas.microsoft.com/xps/2005/06/storyfragments| 有关包关系的详细信息，请参阅 上可供下载的*开放打包约定（OPC）* 规范的1.3 节。For more information about package relationships see section 1.3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions (OPC)* specification available for download at . 有关 XPS 文档的详细信息，请参阅可在[https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000)下载的*开放 XML 纸张规范（XPS）* 。For more information about XPS documents see the *Open XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=67000).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `id` 必须是有效的 XML 标识符。`id` must be a valid XML identifier. `id` 类型为 xsd： ID，必须遵循*XML 架构第2部分：数据类型*规范（请参阅[https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)）中规定的命名约定。The `id` type is xsd:ID and must follow the naming conventions prescribed in the *XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes* specification (see [https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/#ID)). 如果指定的 `id` 与此部分拥有的任何关系的 不匹配，则不会删除任何关系，也不会引发异常。If the specified `id` does not match the for any of the relationships that are owned by this part, no relationship is deleted and no exception is thrown. 除了删除指定关系外， 方法也不会在物理上更改此部分或目标部分。Other than deleting the specified relationship, the method does not physically change either this part or the target part.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，返回部分内容的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 类型。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] type of the part content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 抽象基类的虚拟方法。 is a virtual method of the abstract base class. 仅在无法在构造时提供内容类型值的派生类型中实现此方法，或者如果计算内容类型值为重要或成本高昂的操作，则为。Implement this method only in derived types where the value for the content type cannot be provided at the time of construction, or if calculating the content type value is a nontrivial or costly operation. 返回值必须是有效的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] 内容类型。The return value must be a valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_mime](~/includes/tla2sharptla-mime-md.md)] content type. 派生类可以调用 将派生类的 属性初始化为默认值。Derived classes can call to initialize the property of the derived class to a default value. 设置 属性后，不能更改它。After the property has been set it cannot be changed.

exception.span: 派生类不为 方法提供所需的重写实现。

span.span: The derived class does not provide an override implementation required for the method.

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns the part content stream opened with a specified and .
The content data stream of the part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序不应直接调用 ，而应调用 。Applications should not call directly, but instead should call .

para.span: 派生 实现应不会对调用它的 方法所执行的顺序或操作进行任何假设。

span.span: The derived implementation should make no assumptions about the order or operations performed by the method that calls it.

para.span: 派生 方法由 方法调用，以打开并返回基于派生类中实现的物理格式的部分数据流。

span.span: The derived method is called by the methods to open and return the part data stream based on the physical format implemented in the derived class.

para.span: 默认情况下，提供并使用抽象 类的 子类实现。

span.span: By default, the subclass implementation of the abstract class is provided and used.

para.span: 在默认操作中， 在内部调用 类的 以打开并返回 ZIP 文件中的部分数据流。

span.span: In the default operation, internally calls of the class to open and return the part data stream from a ZIP file.

The parent package of the part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是只读属性，只有当父 处于打开状态时才能访问该属性。 is a read-only property that can be accessed only when the parent is open. 属性由 构造函数自动设置。The property is automatically set by the constructor. 在由构造函数设置后，将无法更改该部件的父 。After it is set by the constructor, the parent for the part cannot be changed.

span.span: The part has been deleted.
